alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 11:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Mainland Monroe, northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1151 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Weston to 11 miles northwest of Miccosukee Resort. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Sunrise, Hallandale, Miami Gardens, The Redland, Kendall, Weston, North Miami, Doral, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Dania Beach, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Hialeah Gardens and Sunny Isles Beach. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
